name: flowbites-marketplace
description: Flowbites Marketplace - Multi-sided platform for templates and services

scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.dev:local: concurrently "cd server && npm run dev" "cd next-client && npm run dev"
scripts.postinstall: cd server && npm install && cd ../next-client && npm install

server/src/**/*.js: cd server && npm run test:ci 2>/dev/null || true
